## Frequently Asked Questions

__

How do I sign up for the Portal? 

If you are a registered apprentice or sponsor, please contact Customer Service to have an email invitation sent to you with instructions and a link to activate your Portal account.   
  
If you are a new apprentice or organization staff member and do not have a SkilledTradesBC ID yet, [simply create an account on the SkilledTradesBC Portal](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/Account/Login/Register?returnUrl=%2F) to start the process. 

__

I currently use Direct Access. When will I receive access to the Portal? 

If you are currently an apprentice or sponsor who has registered with us before and have a SkilledTradesBC ID, please contact Customer Service to have an email invitation sent to you with instructions and a link to activate your Portal account.   
  
Please note that those with training provider and school district profiles do not yet have access to the Portal and remain on [DirectAccess](https://www.itadirectaccess.ca/prod/external/Login.aspx) at this time. 

__

I have not received the SkilledTradesBC portal invitation link yet. What can I do? 

If you are an active apprentice or sponsor with a valid SkilledTradesBC ID, please contact Customer Service by phone or email to receive the Portal invitation email with the activation link. 

__

I am not able to use my email address while registering for the SkilledTradesBC Portal. What can I do? 

To sign up for the SkilledTradesBC Portal, you must use a unique email address. If your email is already linked to another account, activate your account by clicking the link provided in the invitation sent to your registered email address.   
  
If you are unsure which email address is linked to your Portal account, please contact Customer Service for assistance. 

__

Can I continue using Direct Access after I have received an invitation email to access the SkilledTradesBC Portal? 

Once the SkilledTradesBC Portal invitation email is sent to you, your access to Direct Access will automatically be deactivated and you must sign up for the SkilledTradesBC Portal. This ensures that your data is carefully transitioned to a new platform and ensures your information is in one place. 

__

How do I register to become an apprentice via the SkilledTradesBC Portal? 

If you are an active apprentice with a valid SkilledTradesBC ID and have activated your Portal account, [ log into your account](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/SignIn) to start the process.   
  
If you do not have a valid SkilledTradesBC ID yet, begin the process by [creating a Portal account](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/Account/Login/Register).   
  
Once you have logged in, navigate to Registrations in the menu to start registering for your program. Click the “+ New Registration” button and have your sponsor’s SkilledTradesBC ID ready in order to complete the registration process.   
  
For more detailed instructions, [read this quick guide](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/article/KA-01229/en-us). 

__

I am an active apprentice and have a new sponsor. How do I update my sponsor information on the SkilledTradesBC Portal? 

If you are an apprentice with a valid SkilledTradesBC ID and registered in an apprenticeship program, [log into your account](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/SignIn) to start the process.   
  
If you do not have a valid SkilledTradesBC ID yet, begin by creating an account on the SkilledTradesBC [Portal](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/Account/Login/Register).   
  
Once you’ve logged in, navigate to Registrations in the menu, then click on the “+ Change Sponsor” button. Remember to have your sponsor’s SkilledTradesBC ID ready, as it’s required to complete your registration. For more detailed instructions, [read this quick guide](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/article/KA-01229/en-us).   
  
Alternatively, your sponsor can initiate the sponsorship change through their Portal account. For instructions on how to do this, [read this quick guide](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/article/KA-01328/en-us). 

__

How do I register my organization as a Sponsor through the SkilledTradesBC Portal? 

Sponsors can register their organizations through the Portal by following the [instructions in this guide](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/article/KA-01313/en-us). 

__

As a sponsor, how do I register my new apprentice through the SkilledTradesBC Portal? 

To register your apprentice, log into your Portal account and navigate to Registrations in the menu.   
  
Click the “+ New Registration” button and have your apprentice’s SkilledTradesBC ID ready in order to complete your request.   
  
For more detailed instructions, [read this guide](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/article/KA-01229/en-us). 

__

How do I change the sponsor for my apprentice through the SkilledTradesBC Portal? 

Once you have logged into the Portal, navigate to Registrations in the menu.   
  
Click the “+ Change Sponsor for an Apprentice” button. Select the organization if you have multiple accounts linked to your email address. Locate the apprentice using SkilledTradesBC ID and their last name. Choose the program for which you would like to become the sponsor of the selected apprentice. Confirm to initiate request. [[Link to Portal Guide]](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/article/KA-01229/en-us). 

__

How do I gain access to the SkilledTradesBC Portal to report apprenticeship hours for my apprentice? 

If your role is to simply report apprenticeship hours on behalf of a sponsor, you can create an Authorized Staff account.   
  
If you have not registered with SkilledTradesBC before, start by creating an account on the Portal and selecting “I want to be an authorized staff of a sponsor”.   
  
Once you have successfully signed up and received a SkilledTradesBC ID, you can gain access by completing the [Add-Remove Staff form](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/add-remove-staff) or by having your organization’s primary contact add you as a staff member on the Portal using your SkilledTradesBC ID.   
  
For detailed instructions, [read this guide](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/article/KA-01316/en-us). 

__

I received a notification stating that my apprenticeship is no longer linked to a sponsor. Is it possible to have my remaining work-based training hours logged into my account? 

If you have any remaining work-based training hours to be reported by your previous sponsor, they can still submit them through the SkilledTradesBC Portal within three months of the sponsor removal.   
  
Alternatively, you may have your new sponsor submit the hours on behalf of your previous sponsor. Please note that it is at your sponsor's discretion how they wish to verify the hours you have worked and how many hours they will ultimately report.   
  
For instructions on how to add Work-Based Training hours, sponsors can [follow this quick guide](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/article/KA-01197/en-us). 

__

The invitation link sent to me isn’t working. What can I do? 

The invitation link sent to you is valid for 10 days so your link may have expired.   
  
Follow the steps below to retrieve the invitation link:   


  1. Click on the invitation link sent to your email address.
  2. Click Redeem.
  3. You will receive the following message – “Portal invitation has expired. Resend invitation?”
  4. Click Resend Invitation.



__

How can I set up a strong password? 

Your password **must** meet the following requirements:

  * Be at least 8 characters long.
  * Include at least three of the following categories: 
    * Uppercase letters
    * Lowercase letters
    * Digits
    * Special characters (e.g., !, #, %)

  


Your password **must not** contain:

  * Your first or last name
  * Your email address
  * Your date of birth
  * Your SkilledTradesBC ID
  * Must not reuse a previous password



__

How can I retrieve my password? 

If you have forgotten your password, click on “Forgot your Password” on the sign-in page. Enter your registered email address. A password reset link will be sent to your email address. 

__

Can I change my email address? 

To update your registered email address, you must contact Customer Service. Email addresses cannot be updated through the Portal. 

__

Why am I locked out of my account? 

After 5 unsuccessful login attempts, users are locked out of the SkilledTradesBC Portal for 60 minutes. 

__

I do not see the option to submit a Trade Qualifier Application on my Portal account. Should I create a new account on the Portal? 

You may not be seeing the Trade Qualifier Application on your account because you may not have created the correct Portal account type. 

__

Can I sign up for the Portal as a Foundation student? ​ 

Yes, you can create an account by selecting “Register as an apprentice/ foundation program student” to get started. As a foundation student, you will be able to see your exam marks through the Portal.​ 

__
